original_title: 魔法の天使 クリィミーマミ Long Good-Bye
overview: Shingo is planning the film "A Story of Two Worlds" starring Megumi. Yuu's transformation into Creamy Mami is happening without her wanting it. She is asked to star in the film too. But the magic doesn't last...
title: Creamy Mami: Long Good-Bye
